info.title: The Tower API (v1)
info.description: Endpoints for various resources in The Tower.

StoreBackgroundSkinRequest.description: Payload sent when creating a new BackgroundSkin

StoreGuardianRequest.description: Payload sent when creating a new Guardian

StoreMenuRequest.description: Payload sent when creating a new Menu

StoreProfileBannerRequest.description: Payload sent when creating a new ProfileBanner

StoreSongRequest.description: Payload sent when creating a new Song

StoreTowerSkinRequest.description: Payload sent when creating a new TowerSkin

UpdateBackgroundSkinRequest.description: Payload for updating an existing BackgroundSkin. All fields optional.

UpdateBonusTypeRequest.description: Any subset of fields may be supplied to update the bonus type.

UpdateGuardianRequest.description: Payload for updating an existing Guardian. All fields optional.

UpdateMenuRequest.description: Payload for updating an existing Menu. All fields optional.

UpdateProfileBannerRequest.description: Payload for updating an existing ProfileBanner. All fields optional.

UpdateRelicRequest.description: Any subset of fields may be supplied to update the relic.

UpdateSongRequest.description: Payload for updating an existing Song. All fields optional.

UpdateTierRequest.description: Any subset of fields may be supplied to update the tier.

UpdateTowerSkinRequest.description: Payload for updating an existing TowerSkin. All fields optional.

BackgroundSkinResource.description: A background skin available in the API

BonusCategoryResource.description: Grouping bucket for bonus types (Damage, Defense, Utility, Misc).

BonusTypeResource.description: Master definition of a bonus type

GuardianResource.description: Represents a Guardian available in the API

LabCategoryResource.description: Grouping bucket for bonus types (Damage, Defense, Utility, Misc).

LabResource.description: Represents a Laboratory with its category and per-level stats

MenuResource.description: Represents a Menu available in the API

ProfileBannerResource.description: Represents a ProfileBanner available in the API

RelicBonusResource.description: Bonus as it appears on a relic (includes rolled value)

SongResource.description: Represents a song available in the API

TowerSkinResource.description: A tower skin available in the API
